name: Bit Killer
description:
In this game, you enter the arcade world of virus killing. Earn XP from destroying viruses in order to fight big bosses as well as level up your skills.

Controls:

W,A,S,D = Move

Left Click = Shoot

E = Place Skill

ESC = Pause

Design Team:

Coding: Leon Lowe

Artwork: Leon Lowe

Music: Harry Simpson

Features:

Simple yet cool shooter mechanics

Upgradable stats and skills

Multiple bosses

Multiple enemy types
